rapgreen

Class TreeScoring

  • java.lang.Object
    • rapgreen.TreeScoring

  • public class TreeScoring
extends java.lang.Object
    Tree scoring class.

    This class contains several tools to compute gene to gene scores in an annotated phylogenetic tree.
